Text: need username & password...! can't play the game...

@euresis1 - You need to create an account 1st to play. This is not a pirate or cracked game, it's a real live poker room. 

Anyhow PKR has the highest RAKE of any poker room online. Only air heads play there and the bonus is near impossible to clear. 

You can only play 4 tables at a time and the game play is ssslllloooowwww at best. 

Give it a 3/10 for gameplay but 10/10 for graphics.
